reviewtext: I recently bought an LG 55LN5700 Smart TV and was pleasantly surprised to see that it had a Kensington Lock port.This is rather useful since in my country and my neighourhood, it provides me with the peace of mind I need if I go to work or on trips to know that my TV is held securely to my wall.The cable itself is made of good quality and if my 55 inch TV was left to be suspended by the cable, I'm sure it would easily handle the weight.If you have a smart TV with a Kensington Lock port, and you want an extra level of security, I recommend this lock!
